channel.title: Need Port-Forwarding Help!
channel.description:
I've looked at the tut for making a server, and I read all 10 pages. I've seen this problem posted a lot, sooo...
Whenever I open up my Command Prompt and type in "ipconfig", I get that annoying message like. its not recognized as a batch file or whatever. I'm also wondering if I need to port-forward because my Modem doubles as a Router. Its a 2WIRE 2701HG-B. I've only gotten that far, so...yeah. Please don't post just to call me names and say stupid shit, it gets old. Thank you.

item.title: Need Port-Forwarding Help!
item.dc:creator: @Thickertech Thickertech
item.description:
@Thickertech wrote:

ffs why dont you read the rules (except chassy). we dont help with portforwarding

Read full topic

item.title: Need Port-Forwarding Help!
item.dc:creator: @Fanz Fanz
item.description:
@Fanz wrote:

The same thing is happening to me with the ipconfig thing and im failing of getting it to run :eek:

But someone was nice and gave me a compiler and a run that works great and is updated today so try these:

Compiler:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Run Server:

@echo off color 0a title Run Server By Fanz java -Xmx256m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Have fun and if you get help with the ipconfig thing or I manage to Pm me or I will Pm you

Read full topic

item.description:

yo dude dont use it
i just open my utorrent and go into preferences change settings to 43594 and lock it then close it run ur server then re open it
but u need no-ip working aswell
